Get summary of top tags for both inflows and expenses

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}

  children={"Request"}
>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[]}
>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Tag summary","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"inflowTags":{"description":"Top inflow tags with amounts","type":"array","items":{"type":"object","properties":{"tag":{"type":"string","description":"Tag name","example":"groceries"},"amount":{"type":"number","description":"Total amount for this tag","example":"500.00"},"type":{"type":"string","description":"Type of transaction","example":"expense","enum":["inflow","expense"]}},"required":["tag","amount","type"],"title":"TagSummaryItemDto"}},"expenseTags":{"description":"Top expense tags with amounts","type":"array","items":{"type":"object","properties":{"tag":{"type":"string","description":"Tag name","example":"groceries"},"amount":{"type":"number","description":"Total amount for this tag","example":"500.00"},"type":{"type":"string","description":"Type of transaction","example":"expense","enum":["inflow","expense"]}},"required":["tag","amount","type"],"title":"TagSummaryItemDto"}}},"required":["inflowTags","expenseTags"],"title":"TagSummaryDto"}}}},"401":{"description":"User is not authorized to view these tag statistics"},"404":{"description":"User not found"}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
